########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND myBlock_sources
    test_impl.cc
    my_qpsk_demod_cb_impl.cc
)

set(myBlock_sources "${myBlock_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT myBlock_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT myBlock_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-myBlock SHARED ${myBlock_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-myBlock ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-myBlock PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_myBlock_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-myBlock PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-myBlock RUNTIME_COMPONENT "myBlock_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "myBlock_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

include_directories(${CPPUNIT_INCLUDE_DIRS})

list(APPEND test_myBlock_sources
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_myBlock.cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_myBlock.cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_my_qpsk_demod_cb.cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_test.cc
)

add_executable(test-myBlock ${test_myBlock_sources})

target_link_libraries(
  test-myBlock
  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
  gnuradio-myBlock
)

GR_ADD_TEST(test_myBlock test-myBlock)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
